title: [Question][NVIDIA]: How to save memory in GPT pretraining?
body:
### 请提出你的问题

We are integrating TransformerEngine with PaddleNLP and need to verify fp8 training convergence for GPT models. Now we have already verify the convergence of 1.3B/5B/13B GPT model on 64xH100 GPUs.

The next models we want to verify are 89/175B GPT. But it always got OOM no matter how to setup the training. I have tried `FSDP stage3`, `Tensor Parallel` and recompute the full TransformerLayer. But they are all OOM w/ or w/o TransformerEngine on 128xH100 GPUs.

It's there any way to further reduce the momery usage in GPT training? 


GPU：128xH100 80GB
Config:
- BS=1 DP=1 TP=1 FSDP=128 stage3 recompute=full
- BS=1 DP=1 TP=8 FSDP=16 stage2 recompute=full
- BS=1 DP=2 TP=8 FSDP=8 stage2 recompute=full

Command example:
```
python -u  -m paddle.distributed.launch \
    --gpus "0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7" \
    --log_dir logs/89B/${log_dir} \
    --ips="${IP_STR}" \
    ${PNLP_PATH}/llm/gpt-3/run_pretrain.py \
    --model_type "gpt" \
    --model_name_or_path gpt3-89B-en \
    --tokenizer_name_or_path gpt3-89B-en \
    --input_dir "/workspace/llama_openwebtext" \
    --output_dir $OUT_DIR \
    --split 949,50,1 \
    --max_seq_length 1024 \
    --per_device_train_batch_size $BS \
    --per_device_eval_batch_size $BS \
    --tensor_parallel_degree $TP \
    --sharding_parallel_degree $FSDP \
    --sharding $STAGE \
    --pipeline_parallel_degree 1 \
    --fuse_attention_qkv 1 \
    --use_flash_attention 0 \
    --bf16  \
    --fp16_opt_level "O2"  \
    --scale_loss 1024 \
    --learning_rate 0.00001 \
    --min_learning_rate 0.000005 \
    --max_steps 40000 \
    --save_steps 5000 \
    --weight_decay 0.01 \
    --warmup_ratio 0.01 \
    --max_grad_norm 1.0 \
    --logging_steps 100 \
    --dataloader_num_workers 1 \
    --hidden_dropout_prob=0.1 \
    --attention_probs_dropout_prob=0.1 \
    --eval_steps 1000 \
    --report_to "visualdl" \
    --disable_tqdm true \
    --gradient_accumulation_steps 1 \
    --do_train \
    --do_eval \
    --continue_training 0 \
    --recompute 1 \
    --recompute_granularity full \
    --device "gpu"
```

title: [New features] Add chat template for training
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
New features

### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
APIs

### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
chat-templte 支持训练自定义， 依赖：https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/7219

qwen 模型训练：

```json
{
    "model_name_or_path": "qwen/qwen-7b-chat",
    "dataset_name_or_path": "./data",
    "output_dir": "./checkpoints/qwen_lora_ckpts",
    "per_device_train_batch_size": 4,
    "gradient_accumulation_steps": 4,
    "per_device_eval_batch_size": 8,
    "eval_accumulation_steps":16,
    "num_train_epochs": 3,
    "learning_rate": 3e-04,
    "warmup_steps": 30,
    "logging_steps": 1,
    "evaluation_strategy": "epoch",
    "save_strategy": "epoch",
    "src_length": 1024,
    "max_length": 2048,
    "bf16": true,
    "fp16_opt_level": "O2",
    "do_train": true,
    "do_eval": true,
    "disable_tqdm": true,
    "load_best_model_at_end": true,
    "eval_with_do_generation": false,
    "metric_for_best_model": "accuracy",
    "recompute": true,
    "save_total_limit": 1,
    "tensor_parallel_degree": 1,
    "pipeline_parallel_degree": 1,
    "lora": true,
    "use_chat_template": true
  }
```

qwen 的多轮对话精调过程中，system, user-query, special-tokens 都是看不到的，所以为了支持： https://github.com/QwenLM/Qwen/blob/main/finetune.py#L141  原生数据构造的方式，将 qwen 的 chat-template 的数据构造方式转化成以下格式即可与其对齐。

```json
{
    "system": "You are a helpful assistant.",
    "conversation": ["\n<|im_start|>user\n{{user}}<|im_end|>\n<|im_start|>assistant\n", "{{bot}}<|im_end|>"],
    "query": "\n<|im_start|>user\n{{query}}<|im_end|>\n<|im_start|>assistant\n"
}
```

执行命令：

```shell
python finetune_generation.py qwen/lora_argument.json
```



## TODOS

- [ ] 支持在推理阶段按照对话轮次为单位来进行截断

title: [Trainer]Add  unified checkpoint for hybrid parallel.
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
New features

### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Trainer

### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->

Add unified checkpoint which merge tp tensor, and save all model weights to ` model.safetensors.index.json`.
- eg. for tp4pp2, 
- it will save `model-00001-of-00008.safetensors ~ model-00008-of-00008.safetensors`
- `00001-00004` store all tensor for pp00, `00005-00008` store all tensor for pp01
-  each of `00001-00004`  are tensor merge on tensor parallel, and equally part to 4 parts.

others: add `distributed_isfile`  and `distributed_file`  to copy some small files to other machine nodes.

TODO: 
- Support optimizer broadcast for dp.


#### Before
```python
-rw-rw-r-- 1 zhonghui03 zhonghui03       1011 Oct 16 15:34 config.json
-rw-rw-r-- 1 zhonghui03 zhonghui03 1138788706 Oct 16 15:34 model_state.tp00.pdparams

```

title: [Bug]: ImportError: cannot import name 'Taskflow' from partially initialized module 'paddlenlp'
body:
### 软件环境

```Markdown
- paddlepaddle:2.5.1
- paddlepaddle-gpu: 2.5.1
- paddlenlp: 2.6.1
```


### 重复问题

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### 错误描述

```Markdown
无论是命令行还是脚本文件。
在下面的例子中，都会报错。
https://gitee.com/paddlepaddle/PaddleNLP/blob/develop/applications/information_extraction/text/README.md
而且，现有的issues中也没有可行的解决方案。
```


### 稳定复现步骤 & 代码

>>> from pprint import pprint
>>> from paddlenlp import Taskflow

>>> schema = {"武器名称": ["产国", "类型", "研发单位"]}
# 设定抽取目标和定制化模型权重路径
>>> my_ie = Taskflow("information_extraction", schema=schema, task_path='./checkpoint/model_best')
>>> pprint(my_ie("威尔哥（Virgo）减速炸弹是由瑞典FFV军械公司专门为瑞典皇家空军的攻击机实施低空高速轰炸而研制，1956年开始研制，1963年进入服役，装备于A32“矛盾”、A35“龙”、和AJ134“雷”攻击机，主要用于攻击登陆艇、停放的飞机、高炮、野战火炮、轻型防护装甲车辆以及有生力量。"))

title: [Question]: 离线将Pytorch格式的LLM转换成Paddle格式如何操作？
body:
### 请提出你的问题


目前只看到在使用AutoModelForCausalLM在加载模型时，自动下载通过convert_from_torch参数转换。用于服务器无法访问外网，我手动下载的Hugingface上面的模型到本地，然后加载，发现加载本地模型转换就会报一些奇奇怪怪的错误，目前使用bloom、llama和baichuan，都没有转换成功？

我看同类的框架（hf transformers、mindformers）中很多都有相应的转换：
transformers中的转换：
https://github.com/huggingface/transformers/blob/d085662c596066bad82942b1e15819f675cbd15e/src/transformers/models/llama/convert_llama_weights_to_hf.py#L39

mindformers中的转换：
https://gitee.com/mindspore/mindformers/blob/dev/mindformers/models/glm/convert_weight.py

请问目前PaddleNLP中支持的LLM，有提供对应的模型的模型格式转换方法吗？

title: [Tokenizer] fix _decode
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
Bug fixes
### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
APIs
### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
* bugs:
`sentencepiece` cannot process `numpy.ndarray`. 
Thus, when the data type of `token_ids`  is `numpy.ndarray`, tokenizer cannot decode it.

* solution:
`PretrainedTokenizer._decode`  requires `token_ids:List[int]` , thus `token_ids` will convert to list in `_decode`.

```python
class PretrainedTokenizer
    def _decode(
        self,
        token_ids: List[int],
        skip_special_tokens: bool = False,
        clean_up_tokenization_spaces: bool = True,
        spaces_between_special_tokens: bool = True,
        **kwargs
    ) -> str:
  
        if isinstance(token_ids, np.ndarray):
            token_ids = token_ids.tolist()
```
* fix issue #7172

title: [Feature]: Implement `Meta-Transformer`: A Unified Framework for Multimodal Learning
body:
### Feature request
Implement this in Paddle paddle
Multimodal learning aims to build models that can process and relate information from multiple modalities. Despite years of development in this field, it still remains challenging to design a unified network for processing various modalities (e.g. natural language, 2D images, 3D point clouds, audio, video, time series, tabular data) due to the inherent gaps among them. In this work, we propose a framework, named Meta-Transformer, that leverages a frozen encoder to perform multimodal perception without any paired multimodal training data. In Meta-Transformer, the raw input data from various modalities are mapped into a shared token space, allowing a subsequent encoder with frozen parameters to extract high-level semantic features of the input data. Composed of three main components: a unified data tokenizer, a modality-shared encoder, and task-specific heads for downstream tasks, Meta-Transformer is the first framework to perform unified learning across 12 modalities with unpaired data. Experiments on different benchmarks reveal that Meta-Transformer can handle a wide range of tasks including fundamental perception (text, image, point cloud, audio, video), practical application (X-Ray, infrared, hyperspectral, and IMU), and data mining (graph, tabular, and time-series). Meta-Transformer indicates a promising future for developing unified multimodal intelligence with transformers. 

### Motivation

[Implementation is available](https://github.com/invictus717/MetaTransformer)


### Your contribution

-

title: [Question]: use-x-base模型如何通过训练提升模型推理速度？
body:
### 请提出你的问题

用的是cpu
paddlenlp 2.5.2

我是一个新手，我想让模型训练之后，推理一张图片的速度达到5秒内推理一张图片，目前训练之后的推理速度是15秒
我按照该文档（https://gitee.com/paddlepaddle/PaddleNLP/blob/develop/applications/information_extraction/document/README.md#代码结构）模型微调那里的步骤，我通过修改不同的参数尝试了十几次，但仍旧无法提升模型的推理速度
默认模型的推理一张图片是十秒，我用labelstudio标注好数据，使用对应脚本创建好训练集，使用微调脚本开始训练
都是默认参数，训练完成之后，推理一张图片最快是15秒，并且模型目录的大小从900m变成了3个g
我查阅了相关的trainer的api文档（https://gitee.com/paddlepaddle/PaddleNLP/blob/develop/docs/trainer.md）
以及查阅了百度等，知道了混合精度训练会让推理速度变快，但是bf16 True和fp16 True为参数设置启动训练后都会有报错（报错信息我放到了下面）导致无法进行训练
除了这两个尝试，我仔细查看了对应的日志，存在一个do_compress参数，好像是模型压缩的参数，但是在文档中没有，这个参数我设置为True后，好像也没有进行模型压缩，模型目录的大小仍是3g


bf16报错
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "finetune.py", line 177, in <module>
    main()
  File "finetune.py", line 147, in main
    train_result = trainer.train(resume_from_checkpoint=checkpoint)
  File "/home/ocr/anaconda/envs/conda_env_paddlenlp_uie/lib/python3.8/site-packages/paddlenlp/trainer/trainer.py", line 515, in train
    model = self._wrap_model(self.model_wrapped)
  File "/home/ocr/anaconda/envs/conda_env_paddlenlp_uie/lib/python3.8/site-packages/paddlenlp/trainer/trainer.py", line 1181, in _wrap_model
    decorated = paddle.amp.decorate(
TypeError: decorate() got an unexpected keyword argument 'dtype'
可能是因为bf16不支持cpu，只能使用gpu？我没找到相关文档，不确定


fp16报错
 0%|          | 0/160 [00:00<?, ?it/s]Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "finetune.py", line 177, in <module>
    main()
  File "finetune.py", line 147, in main
    train_result = trainer.train(resume_from_checkpoint=checkpoint)
  File "/home/ocr/anaconda/envs/conda_env_paddlenlp_uie/lib/python3.8/site-packages/paddlenlp/trainer/trainer.py", line 699, in train
    scale_before = self.scaler._scale.numpy()
AttributeError: 'GradScaler' object has no attribute '_scale'
  0%|          | 0/160 [00:54<?, ?it/s]
我看了下源码，这里就是没有这个_scale方法，那么cpu进行fp16训练，应该如何训练呢？我没有找到对应的文档，不知道该如何处理，需要一些帮助

在新版本之中gpt2的训练，在其它一切成功的前提下(指的是跟着官网走尝试成功)。
无法使用中文训练【官网只给出英文训练】，请问哪里能够切换，比如那个参数切换？
2、基于前面的问题
另：在看了run_pretrain_trainer.py文件中：
model_type: Optional[str] = field(default="gpt", metadata={"help": "Only support for ernie pre-training for now."})
特别标明只支持ernie ，是不是目前gpt不行？
还有里面的
https://paddlenlp.readthedocs.io/zh/latest/model_zoo/transformers.html，这个连接也过不去。
3、目前能够训练【中文】的可行的方法是什么？

title: [Question]: 跟着官网的gpt3训练出现乱码。
body:
### 请提出你的问题

gpt3，场景就是能够训练的前提下，把语料换成中文，训练好后，生成的时候出现乱码。
【在此之前试过英文训练，是可以看出效果的，没有乱码。】

问题：
1、PaddleNLPgpt3支持中文训练吗？
2、有那个命令可以切换到中文相关的训练呀？

有过的怀疑：
1、可能是因为词表的问题，但是我不会改。
2、可能有某个隐藏的角落，有对应的修改，但是文档找半天找不到。

title: [Bug]: GPU环境下CUDA error(700)
body:
### 软件环境

```Markdown
- paddlepaddle:
- paddlepaddle-gpu: nightly-build 10月8日版本  https://www.paddlepaddle.org.cn/whl/linux/gpu/develop.html
- paddlenlp: develop分支 68bb39dc90968e9997f029ff96609cc0179563f3
```


### 重复问题

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### 错误描述

```Markdown
ExternalError: CUDA error(700), an illegal memory access was encountered. 
      [Hint: 'cudaErrorIllegalAddress'. The device encountered a load or store instruction on an invalid memory address. This leaves the process in an inconsistentstate and any further CUDA work will return the same error. To continue using CUDA, the process must be terminated and relaunched. ] (at ../paddle/phi/backends/gpu/cuda/cuda_info.cc:265)
      [operator < cumsum > error]
Aborted (core dumped)
```


### 稳定复现步骤 & 代码

1、导出模型
```
python export_model.py     --model_name_or_path facebook/llama-7b     --output_path ./inference     --dtype float16     --inference_model
```
2、执行推理
```
python predictor.py     --model_name_or_path ./inference     --batch_size 1     --dtype "float16"     --mode "static"     --inference_model
```
高概率出现上述问题
